definitions.definition: A chemical hair treatment imparting or removing curliness , whose effects typically last for a period of weeks; a perm .

Given an n × n {\displaystyle n\times n} matrix a i j {\displaystyle a_{ij}\,} , the sum over all permutations π {\displaystyle \pi \,} of ∏ i = 1 n a i π ( i ) {\displaystyle \prod _{i=1}^{n}{a_{i\pi (i)}}} .
A card whose effects persist beyond the turn on which it is played.

main_definition: A chemical hair treatment imparting or removing curliness , whose effects typically last for a period of weeks; a perm .
secondary_definitions: ( linear algebra , combinatorics ) Given an n × n {\displaystyle n\times n} matrix a i j {\displaystyle a_{ij}\,} , the sum over all permutations π {\displaystyle \pi \,} of ∏ i = 1 n a i π ( i ) {\displaystyle \prod _{i=1}^{n}{a_{i\pi (i)}}} .
( collectible card games ) A card whose effects persist beyond the turn on which it is played.
